body:
Hi I've application for Mod twice and I got denied twice and I got denied each times 

can u please give me steps on how to applicate

because it's been my deprecated for years and I'd like Mod or Evan Jr.mod because I wanna start of with me good old friend Jozzmcozz (jozzeh)

so please leave tips below

title: Application help

replies.body:
Feel free to speak in your first language. :)
And if you've been denied twice, I'm sorry but you probably wont get it  a third time. Read the stickied threads in the staff app sections on how to "applicate"
replies.body_tagged:
Feel free to speak in your first language. :)
And if you've been denied twice, I'm sorry but you probably wont get it  a third time. Read the stickied threads in the staff app sections on how to "applicate"

replies.body: Asking in the forums for help with your application isnt fair too others. Please remember it is your work not the work of others with their tips and trick. Everyone including me who is getting reviewed did not need tips or tricks. Please consider this. And BTW good luck with your third application!

replies.body:
Asking for help in the forums will make Moderators think you aren't prepared yet, try to be more creative, don't hurry, stay calm, that always helps!

I don't think a third time works anyways, but, the best of lucks for you!
